lead_paragraph: Two leading former South American football officials, including one who sat on FIFA's executive committee, were banned for life on Friday as the fallout continued from the graft scandal that has engulfed the sport.

headline.print_headline: Life Bans for Ex-South America FA Duo Jadue, Bedoya
headline.main: Life Bans for Ex-South America FA Duo Jadue, Bedoya

snippet: Two leading former South American football officials, including one who sat on FIFA's executive committee, were banned for life on Friday as the fallout continued from the graft scandal that has engulfed the sport....
